zh.title: 《忍者龙剑传2》2025年1月24日正式发售
zh.description: 虚幻5引擎重制的《忍者龙剑传2：黑之章》带来极致动作体验，登陆PS5、Xbox Series X|S及PC平台。

en.title: Ninja Gaiden 2 Released on January 24, 2025
en.description: Experience the ultimate action gameplay with Unreal Engine 5's remastered 'Ninja Gaiden 2: Sigma'. Available on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

zh.title: 《忍者龙剑传2：黑之章》宣传片差异引热议，PS5与Xbox版本内容对比
zh.description: 分析《忍者龙剑传2：黑之章》在不同平台宣传片中的差异，探讨PS5版本展示多位女性角色，而Xbox版本则替换为男性怪物的现象，引发玩家讨论。

en.title: Ninja Gaiden 2: Sigma Trailer Differences Spark Debate, PS5 vs Xbox Versions Compared
en.description: An analysis of the differences in 'Ninja Gaiden 2: Sigma' trailers across platforms, focusing on PS5's inclusion of female characters and Xbox's shift to male monsters, sparking player discussions.

zh.title: 《忍者龙剑传2：隐藏细节揭秘，重制版的彩蛋与玩家反馈》
zh.description: 探讨《忍者龙剑传2：黑之章》中的隐藏细节与彩蛋设计，揭秘开发者为玩家准备的惊喜，同时分析社区的反馈与期待。

en.title: Ninja Gaiden 2: Hidden Details and Easter Eggs Revealed
en.description: Explore the hidden details and Easter eggs in Ninja Gaiden 2: Sigma, uncovering the surprises developers included for players and analyzing community feedback.
